nodes.text: A funeral was held in 21 BBY at the Jedi Temple for Jedi Master Halsey, who had been killed on Devaron by the Nightbrother Savage Opress during a battle at the Temple of Eedit.

The Confederacy of Independent Systems wished to kill those at the funeral, so three Weequay agents carefully placed a dioxis bomb inside the coffin. Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi discovered this and removed the bomb before Grand Master Yoda could light the coffin, thus saving all those present.
